node, `package.json`

```json
{
  "name": "npm-lock",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "description": "test dependies lock way",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "author": "f2ecoder@vip.qq.com",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {},
  "dependencies": {
    "vue": "^2.2.0"
  }
}

```

,   vue `2.5.9`, `npm outdate`

-|npm-shrinkwrap.json|package-lock.json|yarn.lock
:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:
|npm shrinkwrap||
||npm |yarn
npm||>=5.0.0|
|||yarn
|npm i -S vue@2.1.8 && npm shrinkwrap|npm i -S vue@2.1.8|yarn add vue@2.1.8
|npm uni -S vue && npm I -S vue@2.5.1|npm uni -S vue&& npm i -S vue@2.5.1|yarn upgrade vue@2.5.1
|npm uni -S vue|npm uni -S vue|yarn remove vue
|||
|||
|||

## npm shrinkwrap

vue2.2.0 . 

node: v6.10.2
npm: 3.10.10


`npm i vue@2.2.0 -S` node_modules vue2.2.0

npm `npm shrinkwrap` `npm-shrinkwrap.json`

 `npm-shrinkwrap.json`

**1. **

`npm  i vue-http@2.0.1 -S`, `npm-shrinkwrap.json` `vue-http`

**2. **
`npm uni vue-http -S`, `npm-shrinkwrap.json``vue-http`  -S  -D  

**3. /**

`npm up vue-http@2.0.0 -S` `npm-shrinkwrap.json`

**4. **

node_modules`npm i`

update

vue image[vt-image](https://github.com/vue-tools/vt-image) . [Demo](https://vue-tools.github.io/vt-image/#/demo)

jswebp

```javascript
function detectWebp() {
    var canvas, supportCanvas

    canvas = document.createElement('canvas')
    supportCanvas = canvas.getContext && canvas.getContext('2d')

    if (supportCanvas) {
        canvas.width = canvas.height = 1
        return canvas.toDataURL('image/webp', 0.01).indexOf('image/webp') != -1
    } else {
        return false
    }
}
```

jswebp

```javascript
function detectWebp() {
    var canvas, supportCanvas

    canvas = document.createElement('canvas')
    supportCanvas = canvas.getContext && canvas.getContext('2d')

    if (supportCanvas) {
        canvas.width = canvas.height = 1
        return canvas.toDataURL('image/webp', 0.01).indexOf('image/webp') != -1
    } else {
        return false
    }
}
```
